newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan buys 7,000/T Nov MTBE at $275-$277/tonne.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan buys 7,000/T Nov MTBE at $275-$277/tonne.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) bought by tender 7,000 tonnes of methyl tertiary butyl ether in two parcels at around $275-$277 a tonne, on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis, a CPC source said on Thursday.
The parcels will be delivered during November 1-15 to Keelung or Kaohsiung.
In its last tender, CPC bought 7,000 tonnes of MTBE for October 1-15 delivery at $280 per tonne, c-and-f basis.
MTBE is an additive added to unleaded gasoline to boost its octane number.
